simplesect.title: Detailed Description

formalpara.title: Note:
formalpara.para:
GPS has longitude, latitude, altitude, etc.. in float format. But, if you want to make a tracker and save data to SD card, there is a problem, because FATFS library breaks %f with sprintf() function.
For that purpose I made a new function TM_GPS_ConvertFloat() which converts float number to an integer and decimal part.
